DOC.brief_title: Impact Soft Contact Lenses Lid-Parallel Conjunctival Folds
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand sign statement inform consent receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . The subject must 18 year old . 4 . The subject 's contact lens correction must range 12.00 +8.00 eye . 5 . The subject 's refractive cylinder must less 1.50D eye . 6 . The subject must best visual acuity 20/40 good eye . 7 . The subject must demonstrate adequate mobility 20/40 vision OD OS habitual contact lens . 8 . The subject must adapt soft contact lens wearer eye least 1 year experience contact lens wear . 9 . The subject must normal eye ( i.e . ocular medication infection type ) . 10 . The subject must LidParallel Conjunctival Folds great equal grade 1 OD OS . 1 . Currently self report pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . This may include , limited , ocular/systemic pathology allergy know affect conjunctiva , Sjogren 's Syndrome , rheumatoid arthritis , diabetes , infection , hayfever , ocular surgery . 3 . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . 4 . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia , moderate corneal distortion keratometry . 5 . Any previous , plan ocular intraocular surgery ( e.g . radial keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc . ) 6 . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g . edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) FDA classification scale , previous history sign contact lensrelated corneal inflammatory event ( e.g . past peripheral ulcer round peripheral scar ) , abnormality may contraindicate contact lens wear . 7 . Any ocular infection . 8 . Monovision multifocal contact lens correction . 9 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 90 day prior study enrollment . 10 . Any infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV , self report ) . 11 . Employee investigational clinic ( e.g . Investigator , Coordinator , Technician ) 12 . Contact lens wear OASYS TruEye lenses 13 . Contact lens wear time le 6h/day and/or 5 days/week 14 . Extended wear contact lens .
